headline: Network Score

questions.text: "If your product could say what it needs to be healthy, what would it say?"

text: The Paradata Network Score measures a supply chain in four dimensions: Cost, Risk, Leadtime, and Compliance.

headline: Leadtime

questions.text: "Which components will prevent me from shipping product?"

text: Leadtime scoring evaluates and simulates the impact of component decisions before committing... that’s transparency.

headline: Cost

questions.text: " What should I be paying based on future demand?"

text: Cost scoring measures the variance between supplier-provided costs vs the best available market cost... that’s transparency.

headline: Compliance

questions.text: "Are all my products compliant to current regulations?"

text: Compliance scoring measures the ability of product data to support rigorous examination of import/export compliance... that’s transparency.

headline: Risk

questions.text: "What is my sole source component status by product?"
"Do I have any components going end of life?

text: Risk scoring measures how a component is sourced, proximity to manufacturing locations, supplier performance... that’s transparency.
